com.communote.server.web.commons

Class MessageHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.web.commons.MessageHelper

  • public class MessageHelper
extends Object
    The MessageHelper provides functions to access messages resources and to save messages in the request as either error or success messages.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • CLIENT_ID_REQUEST_ATTRIBUTE

        public static final String CLIENT_ID_REQUEST_ATTRIBUTE
        Request attribute name for storing the current client ID. This attribute should be set if the ThreadLocal that holds the client is not available anymore or cannot be set (e.g. if the client is not active).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
